name: Mandrake teleport
description: Mandrake teleports

name: mandrake
description: Originally not native in the US, this little creature is about one foot tall with a plant taking root in it's head. It darts around wildly, scared of it's own shadow. They're usually pretending to be a fern, but this one is running about on two stubby legs. You've heard that the roots are prized for their uses in cooking.

special_attacks.monster_message: The mandrake's plant stalks harden and it suddenly reappears elsewhere.

description: Barnacles on the water's bed that are native to the Mississippi, and require particularly brackish water. The electrifying bristles make it harder to harvest the sweet, electrically-charged barnacle brine locked within.

A dark black sedge that grows in caves and other dark, moist places. It has long stems ending in tiny blue buds that seem to absorb the light around them, hiding the plant from potential predators. This makes the buds quite the commodity.

A pair of koi, one white and one black, that are cirling endlessly. They're native to the still pools of Japanese mountains, but were painstakingly transported to the Americas in the early 1900s. Their roe are a delicacy that not even Cook was privy to.

name: Stamina Drain for Hemors
description: Stamina drain used by hemors

name: hemor
description: Much like a long necked dog, this antennad creature moves in short, erratic bursts. It's body is composed of plates made out of a material that resembles dead wood, and they stick up like a startled cat's fur at any provocation, releasing a filthy toxic gas. A deep red glow comes from somewhere within it, and several opposable branch-like arms dangle out of it's back and whip around violently.

special_attacks.monster_message: The hemor goes to it's haunches and it's antenna reel forward and whip at your mind itself, each crack a tear in your will to go on.

name: Spawn Hemor
description: Stamina drain used by accursed trees
A dark black tree, it's dead branches swallowing all light that touches it. It lets off a horrid toxic gas, churning the energy from the world around it into death.

special_attacks.monster_message: The trees branches crack and fall away from it, taking on a life of their own.

name: Spawn accursed trees
description: Spawn accursed and drains stamina in area

A long black snakelike creature that floats through the air with no wings, a huge round mouth it's only describable feature. Red spots swirl into and out of existence on the surface of it's skin. The mouth has no teeth, instead the flesh of the creature contorts in an endless spiral, constantly hunting for something to drink.

special_attacks.monster_message: The angel's maw opens to the sky and it devours the energy from the world around it, horrid black trees sprouting as conduits of this costly drink.

name: Spawn butterflies for ascended
description: Spawn butterflies

name: Transforms into mutant animals
description: Transforms into mutant animals and dies

name: kills butterfly and summons mutant animals
description: kills yourself

name: Spawn mutant animal for butterfly
description: Spawns for butterflies

name: Spawn mutant animal for butterfly
description: Spawns for butterflies

description: Spawns for butterflies

name: Spawn mutant animal for butterfly
description: Spawns for butterflies

name: Spawn mutant animal for butterfly
description: Spawns for butterflies

name: kills something
description: kills yourself
A tiny golden butterfly radiating ascended light all around it. The light seems to be slowly forming a cocoon around it, and you don't imagine you'll like what comes out.

special_attacks.monster_message: The butterflies cocoon finally finishes forming and it transforms hyper-energetically into a creature of pure mutational superiority!

description: What appears to be a bright light soon shifts, revealing a central humanoid-shaped source. As you watch the shape changes from one form to another, it's mutation unending. You simply cannot imagine where all of this energy is coming from. This is the ultimate lifeform.

special_attacks.monster_message: The ascended sheds light and grows beautiful golden butterfly wings as a swarm of butterflies radiates from them.

special_attacks.description: You hear an otherworldly screaming as blood and bone come flying out of the ascended.

name: Spawn spirals for ascended angel
description: Spawn spirals

name: Spiral Collapse
description: Spiral mutates you, drains stamina and does damage then dies.

name: Stamina Drain for Spirals
description: Stamina drain used by spirals
A spiral in the air that is either slowly growing or slowly shrinking, you can't tell. You just know that you'd hate to be around when it finishes.

special_attacks.monster_message: The spiral collapses, energy both released and absorbed.

description: Energy goes both into and out of this 'creature' in perfect harmony, freely and infinitely.

special_attacks.monster_message: The energy source ripples and spirals form in the air all around it.

description: One of an endless swarm of 'peace officers,' a unit deployed just before the Cataclysm occured. Their stated purpose was to protect and serve, but people soon realized that their hollow eyes didn't hold much sympathy. It wears the same suit and sunglasses as all the others, and wields the same FN P90.

special_attacks.description: The peace officer weaves in a shot with their p90.

description: A human body that has rapidly decayed to nearly nothing, the yellow barnacles growing inside the lacerations on it's body burning a slow death march into it's tired legs. The clothes have all but rotted off the body in record time, and whatever's left of value on it is overgrown into the bramble of it's flesh.
A feral human in filthy clothing with desperation evident in their eyes as they search for food or anything of value. This one is scratching the side of their head with the barrel of a shoddy pistol.

special_attacks.description: The scav haphazardly fires their pistol!

description: A feral human in filthy clothing with desperation evident in their eyes as they search for food or anything of value. This one is holding a rusty submachine gun at one hip while the other hand picks their nose.

special_attacks.description: The scav holds the submachine gun up with one hand and fires a burst!

description: A feral human in filthy clothing with desperation evident in their eyes as they search for food or anything of value. This one has a ridiculously wide barreled shotgun that it brandishes at any movement.

special_attacks.description: The scav just rips a shot out there!

description: A feral human in filthy clothing with desperation evident in their eyes as they search for food or anything of value. This one has a rifle gripped close to it's chest, ready to aim and start blasting.

special_attacks.description: The scav stops, aims and fires a single shot!

name: Flashbang PMC
description: The pmc has a ridiculously bright flashbang

A human that appears at first to be a special-ops soldier complete with night vision goggles, then you notice the insignia on their armband. One of countless private military contractors who rose up to try and form a new world in their image. The zombies seem to avoid them, and their predator eyes hunt for more lucrative prey. This pmc is feathering the hammer on a holstered pistol.

special_attacks.description: The pmc quickdraws their pistol and fires!

description: A human that appears at first to be a special-ops soldier complete with night vision goggles, then you notice the insignia on their armband. One of countless private military contractors who rose up to try and form a new world in their image. The zombies seem to avoid them, and their predator eyes hunt for more lucrative prey. This pmc keeps switching the firing mode on their submachine gun.

special_attacks.description: The pmc weaves in a burst with their smg!

description: A human that appears at first to be a special-ops soldier complete with night vision goggles, then you notice the insignia on their armband. One of countless private military contractors who rose up to try and form a new world in their image. The zombies seem to avoid them, and their predator eyes hunt for more lucrative prey. This pmc holds a shotgun over their shoulder like a sledgehammer.

special_attacks.description: The pmc lowers their shotgun and fires a blast!

description: A human that appears at first to be a special-ops soldier complete with night vision goggles, then you notice the insignia on their armband. One of countless private military contractors who rose up to try and form a new world in their image. The zombies seem to avoid them, and their predator eyes hunt for more lucrative prey. This pmc has a point slung rifle that they grip tightly.

special_attacks.description: The pmc goes to one knee, takes aim, and fires their rifle.

description: A private military contractor in a ghillied suit of heavy armor that almost manages to conceal their sniper rifle and the fact that they're 7 feet tall. A ballistic mask hides their expression, but you can tell they see you as easy sport.

special_attacks.description: The contract killer lets out a cool breath as they squeeze the trigger.
